formatName: Magic Shadow Archiver Disk Image File
formatDescription: Magic Shadow Archiver is a file format created by the eponomously named software package for creating floppy disk image files for Atari ST computers. It is additionally supported by Atari emulators.
provenanceCompoundName: The National Archives and Records Administration / The National Archives and Records Administration
